title: Requirements Gathering
description: Define the functional and non-functional requirements for NeuralBackup service.

title: Design the NeuralBackup Architecture
description: Develop a high-level and detailed design for the NeuralBackup service, considering storage, security, and usability aspects.

title: Develop Data Storage Strategy
description: Design and implement a scalable and secure data storage strategy for the NeuralBackup service.

title: Implement Memory and Consciousness Backup System
description: Develop the core system responsible for backing up an individual's memories and consciousness.

title: Create User Interface for NeuralBackup Service
description: Design and implement an intuitive user interface for users to interact with the NeuralBackup service.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Ensure data privacy and security in the NeuralBackup service by implementing appropriate measures.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Conduct unit and integration tests on various components of the NeuralBackup service to ensure functionality.
dependencies: Implement Memory and Consciousness Backup System
Create User Interface for NeuralBackup Service

title: Deploy NeuralBackup Service
description: Prepare the service for deployment on suitable infrastructure, ensuring scalability and reliability.

title: Document NeuralBackup Service
description: Write clear and concise documentation for the NeuralBackup service, including usage instructions, troubleshooting guides, and API references.
